Mission

To inspire and develop the next generation of engineers through competitive robotics, fostering innovation, teamwork, and technical excellence in everything we do.

üí°

Vision

To be recognized as a leading VEX V5 team in Canada, known for our innovative designs, competitive spirit, and commitment to STEM education in our community.

‚ö°

Values

Innovation, collaboration, perseverance, and sportsmanship. We believe in learning from both victories and setbacks, always striving to improve.

Community Impact

Inspiring the next generation of innovators

STEM Advocacy & Community Engagement

The Nighthawks are committed to inspiring the next generation of engineers and innovators through community workshops, school demonstrations, and mentorship programs. We believe that robotics is more than just competition‚Äîit's about building skills, confidence, and a passion for STEM that will last a lifetime.

üè´

School Workshops

Regular visits to local schools to demonstrate robotics and inspire students to explore STEM fields.

üë®‚Äçüè´

Get In Touch

Interested in collaborating or learning more about our team?

We're always excited to connect with other teams, potential sponsors, and community members interested in VEX robotics. Whether you're looking for collaboration opportunities, mentorship, or just want to learn more about what we do, feel free to reach out!
